thing-type.label: Molite Movement sensor with temperature and light sensor
thing-type.description: Movement sensor with temperature and light sensor<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtBasic operations</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtThe MoLiTe can detect movement,</li&gt <li&gtThe MoLiTe can measure light intensity</li&gt <li&gtThe MoLiTe can measure the temperature</li&gt <li&gtThe MoLiTe can trigger a security system</li&gt </ul&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress and hold the tamper switch for 2 seconds and release to start the inclusion or exclude process</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress and hold the tamper switch for 2 seconds and release to start the inclusion or exclude process</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtIt is possible to send a wake up notification on user interaction. To do this press and hold the tamper switch for four seconds (mount the device).</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Reset to factory settings
parameter.description: Set all configuration values to default values (factory settings).

parameter.name: config_2_2
parameter.label: 2: Mode timeout
parameter.description: Mode timeout<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe time used in mode 2 to turn the sensor off. This time will start running as soon as detection is seen.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_3_2
parameter.label: 3: Switch off time
parameter.description: Switch off time<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe switch off time will start running as soon as mode timeout is done.</p&gt <p&gtThe Motion sensor is turned on and when movement is detected again.</p&gt <p&gtThe mode timeout (cfg param 1) will start running all over again.</p&gt <p&gtWhen switch off time is done a basic off message is sent to the associated node</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: sensitivity
parameter.description: the sensitivity of the motion circuit

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: The mode
parameter.description: The mode that is entered after detection

options.option: Mode 1: no detection possible. Battery save mode.
Z-Wave chip is always on to request
